title: Show HN: Beads Viewer (Bv)
description: I'm a huge fan of Steve Yegge's great beads project, which is a task management system for use by coding agents.In fact, I probably type or paste the string "beads" 500+ times a day nowadays across all my coding agent sessions (I'm juggling like 10 projects a…
content:
The elegant, keyboard-driven terminal interface for the Beads issue tracker.
curl -fsSL "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Dicklesworthstone/beads_viewer/main/install.sh?$(date +%s)"| bash
